data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Yahats Beach, Oregon, USA (YB15)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Yahats Beach, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using HOBO U12 Thermocouple Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. U12-014) beginning 2005-06-08. The instrument depth was 009 meters, in an overall water depth of 15 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
